channel.title: Fullmetal Alchemist or Fullmetal Alchemist Brother Hood
channel.description: I was just curious, which version do/did you like better? Brotherhood or the original? Personally I like the original better, even though they could of gone a lot farther with it... Say which one you liked better, why you like it better and what could be better in that one and the other one.

item.title: Fullmetal Alchemist or Fullmetal Alchemist Brother Hood
item.dc:creator: @LilXCj LilXCj
item.description:
@LilXCj wrote:

[quote=“gravenfire23, post:26, topic:403636”][quote author=LilXCj link=topic=500701.msg3663899#msg3663899 date=1310506478]

Naruto has gone for really too long… Lol

And bleach hasn’t?
[/quote]
actually kubo said that bleach is far from over :P. personally i dont like Naruto because of all the fillers, at least when bleach has fillers there watchable and quite entertaining[/quote]

Sorry but I enjoy fillers regardless of what show it is.

Read full topic

item.title: Fullmetal Alchemist or Fullmetal Alchemist Brother Hood
item.dc:creator: @LilXCj LilXCj
item.description:
@LilXCj wrote:

[quote=“runewings317, post:19, topic:403636”][quote author=gravenfire23 link=topic=500701.msg3662805#msg3662805 date=1310439651]
I never got why anime companies would make an entire new series for one of there shows because usually they just turn out to suck. i sure hope they dont do that with bleach or ill have to stop watching anime all together.
[/quote]I actually like shippuden better then the original narutos… They have more of a story instead of just really separate things[/quote]

Naruto Shippuden is Naruto. It’s not a “new anime” It’s just a time skip. If you search for the manga it’s always naruto and has been out for 500+ chapters now.

Read full topic

item.title: Fullmetal Alchemist or Fullmetal Alchemist Brother Hood
item.dc:creator: @usman555 usman555
item.description:
@usman555 wrote:

[quote=“Jamie1200, post:6, topic:403636”][quote author=usman555 link=topic=500701.msg3662233#msg3662233 date=1310416656]

Original is better, because in almost every other version of shows, they get worse. Like Yugioh, Yugioh GX, and then the crappiest, Yugioh 5Ds.

Lord, is that still going?
[/quote]Yes, I don’t think they stopped continuing 5Ds atm. I Liked Yugioh the best, kinda liked GX, but 5Ds just made me turn off my TV.

That happened with Dragonball aswell.[/quote]Naw, all the episodes of the Dragonball series were amazing to me. Dragonball was just super awesome and incredible, and DBZ was very good, but it was kind of repititive (Bad guy stronger than Goku, Goku get stronger, kill bad guy, repeat). And then DBGT was OK, but it was like Dragonball, only less thrilling.

runewings317:

KAMIKAMIHAAA!

Read full topic

That happened with Dragonball aswell.[/quote]
best show ever.

item.title: Fullmetal Alchemist or Fullmetal Alchemist Brother Hood
item.dc:creator: @runewings317 runewings317
item.description:
@runewings317 wrote:

I never liked Yu-Gi-Oh GX, but I did enjoy the episodes of 5Ds I did watch. The regular Yu-Gi-Oh was just plain weird. There was no cards or anything, it was just a puzzle and that creepded me out O_o. And I say I like Original better, I like the ending of brotherhood a lot better than the original cause it puts a complete end to it, doesn’t stop with it just saying Al is gunna get Ed back. And it’s funny, I like Envy in Brotherhood, but I like Lust better in the original. And I never like Dragon Ball xD KAMIKAMIHAAA!

Read full topic
